HomePage.headline: Hope, Healing, and Innovation
HomePage.subHeadline: Comprehensive care for hematology and oncology patients, guided by expertise and empathy.
HomePage.name: Dr.Babak Nejati

AboutPage.title: Educational and Professional Background
AboutPage.inf1: General practitioner from Tabriz University of Medical Sciences in 1995.
AboutPage.inf2: Specialization in internal medicine from 2004 to 2008.
AboutPage.inf3: Subspecialty in Hematology and Oncology from Tabriz University of Medical Sciences from 2010 to 2011.
AboutPage.inf4: Advanced fellowship in bone marrow transplantation at Shariati Hospital, Tehran University in 2012.
AboutPage.inf5: Faculty member at Tabriz University of Medical Sciences since 2012.
AboutPage.inf6: Associate Professor at Tabriz University of Medical Sciences since 2019.

ContactPage.address: Tabriz - Golgasht Street, before reaching Imam Reza Hospital, across from Mandana Avenue, Mad Building (blue facade building), 5th floor.

MetaData.title: Hematologist, Oncologist, BMT Expert
MetaData.desc: Cancer diagnosis, personalized treatment plans, and chemotherapy services to improve patient outcomes.
